channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping and waste bin blocking entrance, 21st June
item.description:
Frequent fly tipping next to the waste bins which is blocking pavement and entrance to resident bike shed. Ongoing to the past 2.5years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harrow Manorway, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Bike, 21st June
item.description:
This bike has been left abandoned for over two months, the saddle is missing, it has been abandoned and is using up one of the few cycle hoops outside the Elephant & Castle Bakerloo Line Underground exit, can you please remove this bike, thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and bin blocking gate, 21st June
item.description:
Frequent fly tipping next to the bins in front of Bethel shop. Pests seen. Bins in inappropriate place, blocking residents bike shed gate and resident entrance way. Please request Bethel shop to move bins to prevent further blockages and fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harrow Manorway, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty disgusting high street, 21st June
item.description:
Bromley has turned into a dirty and disgusting high street and now there are foreign men begging up there when they shouldn’t be there ! Hassling people for money , Bromley council sort out our high street the amount Bromley residents pay in council tax is not being reflected in our borough it’s disgusting get the mayor to take a walk down the high street from top to bottom and see what she thinks ! Dirty, disgusting , the city of Bangkok in Thailand is cleaner then Bromley so are a lot of country’s in the EU , sort it out and keep it clean as Bromley is deteriorating rapidly !!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, High Street, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped furniture, 21st June
item.description:
This is another fly tipping event on this spot. Someone left various items. This is happening just after the previous cleaning. This place became a hot spot for fly tipper, counsel will need to take preventive actions please we can not have a corner street constantly with garbage attracting all sort of pests

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blithdale Road, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Grass seeds / grass needs cuttingn, 21st June
item.description:
Grass in Stanhope recreational ground is getting too long and becoming a danger to the dogs who use it daily. Many reports of dogs having painful grass seeds stuck in their paws and ears, etc. It's really painful for them and an expensive problem to fix at the vets. There have been numerous incidents in just this week of pets having grass seeds stuck and needing emergency vet care. As it's a popular dog park and one that we use daily, it would be great to have this area maintained as a safe space for dogs and their owners.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Grove, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous tree branch, 21st June
item.description:
An overhanging tree branch is blocking the path at the end of Pelham Cottages, outside the large house. It looks very dangerous as it’s hanging and blocking the path. The path is extremely busy with walkers and dogs. It needs urgent attention and signage put out. I have tried to contact the council by phone but as it’s a Saturday emergencies don’t happen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Pelham Cottages, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping out of control!, 21st June
